name: Love Lies Here
description:
Murder mystery revolving around Lorelei, our unreliable and emotionally damaged main character, and her attempts to figure out who killed her friend/ maybe girlfriend Ernaline. The game takes place within Ernaline's house after Lorelei wakes up to find her dead.

Controls:

ARROWS to move

L-CTRL to trigger dialogues on objects

SPACE continues dialogue

Click Start to Start

BY
Abigail Calpito
Alyssa Herevia
Ferris Carrillo
Lee Ortiz
Sebastian Avalos
